title: Jonah's WFH Adventure (Work from Hawaii), and Defending Our Portfolio with Defense - Ep 90
itunes:title: Jonah's WFH Adventure (Work from Hawaii), and Defending Our Portfolio with Defense - Ep 90
description:
In this podcast, Vitaliy describes the next adventure his son Jonah will have going to college from Hawaii, as well as the role that defense stocks play in IMA's portfolios today.

You can read these articles online here: https://contrarianedge.com/jonah-doing-jonahs-thing/ and https://contrarianedge.com/defense-stocks/.

Disclosure: Read this before you buy your next stock
